name: The Alternate Invader.
description:
Inspired by The Mandela Catalogue by Alex Kister.

You wake up to hear a crash, and you must investigate. Little do you know, there is an alternate invading your home.

Short 2-minute horror game! Made in about 2 days total.

A and D to move side to side, Space to interact with doors and stairs.

This is actually a rework of an old game of mine called "It Dwells Beneath" but I updated a lot of graphics, fixed bugs, and made the story more coherent.

Menu music: Visitor by HEROICIS (Me)

UPDATE v0.5! Added 2 more endings!
